main.name: Muhammed Özdoğan
main.description: A human being who curious about the computer.
main.bio: Hello World! I'm a student in Sakarya University and Software Contractor at Toyota Europe. I am a full-stack web developer. Also I worked on mobile app development and I have enough information about Dev-Ops to deploy apps with Docker, get SSL Certificates with Let's Encrypt and so on. I am big fan of Spring Framework in Enterprise Web Applications.
main.contactmessage: You can write here to contact with me

resume.skillmessage: Here is my skills that I use daily:

education.description: Here I took my Bachelors of Computer Science and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms..

work.title: Contractor
work.description: I am working at Toyota Europe about 3 years as a Full-Stack Web Developer, I build many of Rest Full API's and beautiful web UI's that run in many factories of Toyota. We generally have used Spring for backend and ReactJs for frontend.

work.title: Co-Founder / CTO
work.description: Fame Things was a Start-Up that me and my friend have found, main purpose of FameThings is founding products that shown in a video. I worked alone for 1 years at tech side, I build core API's of Fame Things, Data Management Panel of Fame Things, Web Extension of Fame Things(Our first MVP) and Official Web Page of Fame Things  and after that we get seed investment and build a crew. With our new crew we developed Mobile Application of Fame Things. I use Spring and ExpressJs for backend. Our Web UI's has been made with Angular and we write mobile application in Java.

projects.title: Fame Things Data Management Panel
projects.category: Dashboard for Fame Things admins and Fame Things influencers.

projects.title: Fame Things Android App
projects.category: This app shows the products that shown on the Youtube videos.

quotes.text:
Try a thing you haven’t done three times.
Once to get over the fear of doing it.
Twice, to learn how to do it.
And a third time to figure out whether you like it or not.
